paragraph: Göran Folkestad (born 1952) is a Swedish songwriter and singer. He is professor of music pedagogy at Malmö Academy of Music. He has competed three times in Melodifestivalen during the 1980s, with the songs:
1984: "Sankta Cecilia" 2nd (duet with Lotta Engberg, under the surname of Pedersen.
1987: "Sommarnatt", unplaced (The song was sung by Robert Wells)
